author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A troubadour from Occitania who doth compose songs of love and chivalry, enchanting all who hear her voice.

newsMedieval:
In market's realm, with sundry goods so fair,
A noble merchant, Whole Foods by name,
Doth choose to carve away its corporate frame,
And simplify, their burden thus laid bare.

In halls of justice, whence the gavel rings,
Lord Justice Roberts summoned to attest,
To scrutinize the standards of the best,
And weigh the fate, in tales of ethics' wings.

On Friday next, a dance of words shall play,
A crossword's jest, 'neath Sol's departing gleam,
No story told, yet riddles intertwined,
We gather close, as darkness seizèd day.

feedItems.title: Whole Foods Plans Corporate Job Cuts, Shuffles Structure
feedItems.description: Whole Foods Market is planning to cut several hundred corporate jobs, the company said, as the grocer reorganizes its structure to simplify operations.

feedItems.title: Chief Justice John Roberts Asked to Address 'Ethical Standards' at Supreme Court
feedItems.description: Senate Judiciary Committee chairman Dick Durbin says court should adopt code of conduct; Republicans are skeptical about a public hearing.

feedItems.title: We Were Just Leaving (Friday Crossword, April 21)

author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous and satirical, might contain references to wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
Of Starship grand and hopes that soar,
To heav'ns high vaults ambition flies,
Yet, in a flash, now lies forlore,
As rocket's fire doth meet demise.

With tears they weep, DVD devotees,
As Netflix sends its final fare,
The streaming age doth sweep with ease,
Old disc's believers deep in despair.

Amidst foul fortune strikes worldly strife,
Wrong door, car, path, a grim mistake,
As bullets pierce the tapestry of life,
A dire reminder of our frail state.

feedItems.title: SpaceX's Starship Explosion: How We Got Here
feedItems.description: SpaceX’s Starship, which exploded a few minutes after launch, is as ambitious as it is massive. Here’s what to know about the rocket that has been developing over the past several years for deep-space missions.

feedItems.title: Netflix Is Mailing Its Last DVD. The Die-Hards Are in Mourning.
feedItems.description: For movie buffs who continued to rent DVDs from streaming-service Netflix, the announcement of its plans to close the DVD business was not welcome.

feedItems.title: Three Shootings in a Week Over a Simple Mistake. Why Is This Happening?
feedItems.description: Wrong door, wrong driveway and wrong car. Recent shootings are ‘part of a much bigger issue in our country.’

author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess.

newsMedieval:
Of Treasury yields and Feds they speak,
In measures fair with timbers bleak.
As May FOMC meets the throng,
Bank strategists dost play along.

With Barclays' names, an HSBC knight,
In chief compliance stands the fight.
Kirsty reigns o'er Fitzwater's stead,
A British bank in tales widespread.

Hark! Sancerres of splendor five,
Affordable e'en for serfs who strive.
Loire Valley glows with rising star,
Guides tasteful souls to wines from far.

feedItems.title: Ten-Year Treasury Yields Fall to 3.546%
feedItems.description: Ten-year Treasury yields declined amid expectations the Fed will shift into an on-hold stance after the May FOMC meeting, Bank of America strategists said.

feedItems.title: Barclays Names HSBC Executive as Compliance Chief
feedItems.description: Kirsty Everett is succeeding Matt Fitzwater, the British bank’s interim chief compliance officer.

feedItems.title: 5 Fantastic Sancerres You Can Actually Afford
feedItems.description: Since the last time our wine columnist looked at this Loire Valley white, its star has only continued to rise—along with its price. Here, a guide to the best values available now.
